summary: Story of a nine-and-a-half year old girl left alone in Sweden while her family is in Africa during the summer of 1981.
cast: Blanca Engström|Shanti Roney|Annika Hallin|Calle Lindqvist|Tova Magnusson|Leif Andrée|Ia Langhammer|Krystof Hádek|Emma Wigfeldt|Michelle Vistam|Vidar Fors|Mats Blomgren|Eleonora Gröning|Per Burell|Henric Holmberg|Åsa Bengtsson
title: Flickan
